message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IT, cs.SI, cs.DS 

The paper discusses an approach for inference with expectation constraints using the "loopy belief propagation" algorithm, which is commonly used in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The paper also discusses optimization and learning procedures, which are common topics in the sub-categories of cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The use of graphical models and probabilistic mixtures suggests a connection to the sub-categories of cs.IT (Information Theory) and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks). Finally, the paper's focus on optimization and inference suggests a connection to the sub-category of cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
